title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.11 - Housing area maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.11 - Housing area maintenance

State Regulations
A supply of brooms, mops, pails, soap, disinfectant and
other materials sufficient to properly clean and maintain facility housing
areas shall be provided prisoners at facility expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7005.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
